title: Miley Cyrus and Cody Simpson: Couple reveal when they first kissed - and it's earlier than you think
text:
They haven't shied away from sharing their relationship in a very public way.

But Miley Cyrus and Cody Simpson have revealed when they shared their first kiss - and it's much earlier than most people think.

The Wrecking Ball star debuted her romance with the Australian singer only a month ago, but it turns out the pair had locked lips before.

Moving on: On Monday, Miley Cyrus and Cody Simpson (both pictured) revealed when they first kissed and it's MUCH earlier than previously thought

The couple were taking part in a split-screen Instagram Live session on Sunday when they made the admission, as Miley also revealed she has written a song for Cody.

Reading the question from a follower as it popped up on their screens, Cody asked: 'When was your first kiss?

'Oh god,' Miley replied, as she tried to rack her brain, and after a pause, she added: 'Three frigging years ago.'

Smooches! The couple were taking part in a split-screen Instagram Live session on Sunday when they made the admission. Reading the question from a follower as it popped up on their screens, Cody asked: 'When was your first kiss?

But the pair weren't quite sure on the date, with Cody suggesting it was more like four or five years ago.

Eventually, they agreed it was in 2015, but neither seemed certain about the location.

'I can't remember, probably at some dirty a** nightclub,' Miley said.

Kiss kiss! 'Oh god,' Miley replied, as she tried to rack her brain, and after a pause, she added: 'Three frigging years ago. I can't remember, probably at some dirty a** nightclub,' Miley said. they ecebntually worked out it was in 2015

Cody seemed to think it was at 1 Oak, an exclusive nightclub in Los Angeles, but Miley was quick to correct him.

'It was probably at your house,' he replied, and Miley agreed.

At the start of 2015, Miley's relationship with Liam Hemsworth had come to an end and she was enjoying a short-lived romance with Arnold Schwarzenegger's son Patrick.

Then in June of that year, Miley was linked to model Stella Maxwell after they were seen out together.

They're not shy! Since debuting their relationship earlier this month, Cody and Miley have been sharing endless loved-up photos to Instagram

Former flames: Miley, who has dated both men and women in the past, enjoyed a brief romance with Brody Jenner's ex, Kaitlynn Carter (right), after splitting with Liam in August

Not long after, Miley shared that she was pansexual - and single.

As well as discussing their first kiss on Sunday night, Miley revealed that she has written a song about her new beau.

She told Cody: 'I sang them [her Instagram followers] the song I wrote for you that I haven't even sung for you yet.'

Miley debuted her romance with Cody on October 4, just two months after announcing her separation from Liam in August.
